Headline: #94 California Temporary Northbound Reroute near California/Altgeld
ShortDescription: NB 94 California buses temp rerouted via: California, Fullerton, Milwaukee, Kedzie, Logan Blvd, and California, near California/Altgeld.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via:  California, Fullerton, Milwaukee, Kedzie, Logan Blvd, and California, due to, street blockage, near California/Altgeld.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
